title: BiBi’s Balance
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Alright, let’s finish up with three sets of sit-ups and call it there for today’s training.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eeeh, three more sets!? Are you insane!? We’ve already done enough.... Any more and this delicate body of mine wouldn’t be able to get up, what would you do then!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>We need to push ourselves sometimes. These next 30 reps will help limber up our bodies.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>No, no way, impossible! Nico will just count your reps for you, Eli. Nico will pay attention to my own safety today and end-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>My, are you giving up, Nico-chan? Then I guess Eli and I are going to be one level above you, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Haaaah~~!?!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You know I’m right. After all, we’re doing extra training that you won’t do, Nico-chan. I’m sure the gap will be obvious the next time we sync up BiBi’s dancing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Grrrr~~, I’ll do it.... I’ll do it, okay! Try not to give up midway, Maki!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What did you say!? Like I would ever give up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Leave it there, both of you....! That’s enough break, let’s finish this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
